items.description:

items.title: Introduction to the Xamarin.CommunityToolkit
items.description:

items.title: Customizable Tabs
items.description:
With the TabView in the Xamarin Community Toolkit you gain a fully customizable tab bar for your Xamarin.Forms app. Swipe to change tabs, background colors, badges, different styling for selected state, top or bottom placement and much more! All you can do without any custom renderers and on any platform.

Customizable Tabs with TabView for Xamarin.Forms by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
With the TabView in the Xamarin Community Toolkit you gain a fully customizable tab bar for your Xamarin.Forms app. Swipe to change tabs, background colors, badges, different styling for selected state, top or bottom placement and much more! items.title: Awesome Scroll Effects in Xamarin.Forms
items.description:
Everyone likes a good parallax scroll effect, right? That's a good start. You can also use behaviors, converters, and data triggers to add other animation effects and transitions to your UI. Xamanimation is a library that leverages all the built-in APIs of Xamarin.Forms to make complex animations with ease.

items.title: Merge Conflict 236: Supporting Your Customers
items.description:

items.title: Null Pointers 35: Multimedia on Mobile
items.description:
Multimedia is all around us! We can’t think of a single app that does not have some form of multimedia: images, sounds or even videos. We don’t even notice anymore! But how hard is it to use it in your own app? Find out all about it in this episode!
